name: Jimmy's Adventure III
description: The wise and venerable sage Ulillillia has been kidnapped by the reincarnated pizza demon Little Caesar himself and it is up to the valiant Jimmy and the scholarly Wachuku to save him from a terrible fate! Navigate the maze of rats and defeat the four guardians to unlock the Seals of Count Carl to relieve Ulillillia's terrible burden and save the day! Gird your loins, it's a bumpy ride.
